name: alexa-skill-tutorial
description: A self-hosted demo skill for amazon alexa based on terraform and typescript.

scripts.predeploy: rm -rf ./dist/* && tsc && zip -j ./dist/lambda_function.zip ./dist/*.js* && cd alexa_layer/nodejs && npm i && cd .. && zip -qr ../dist/alexa_layer.zip nodejs
scripts.deploy: aws --region eu-west-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name alexa-skill-tutorial --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda_function.zip

author: Henry Thasler
